body_content.explanation: If a person or an animal is ribby, the ribs (= bones that curve round from the back to the chest) can be clearly seen. :
examples: You have lost so much weight that you're beginning to look a bit ribby.
The cows were all very ribby following the long drought.

body_content.explanation: Ribby clothing or material has a pattern of raised parallel lines:
examples: She was wearing her favourite red ribby top.
I'm most comfortable wearing a pair of ribby socks over leggings.
